about_the_game:
Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with our second Titan-Forge DLC pack!

The Titan-Forge DLC no. 2 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including:
  • Elf Male Wizard Miniature
  • Tiefling Female Warlock Miniature
  • Human Female Rogue Miniature
Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing four new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Get building, get creative!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
detailed_description:
Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with our second Titan-Forge DLC pack!

The Titan-Forge DLC no. 2 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including:
  • Elf Male Wizard Miniature
  • Tiefling Female Warlock Miniature
  • Human Female Rogue Miniature
Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing four new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Get building, get creative!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
name: Model Builder: Titan-Forge DLC no.2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

short_description: Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with our second Titan-Forge DLC pack! The Titan-Forge DLC no. 2 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including: Elf Male Wizard, Tiefling Female Warlock and Human Female Rogue. Get building, get creative!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
